welcome.subject: Welcome to {{appName}}!
welcome.body: Welcome to {{appName}}! We're excited to have you on board.
welcome.footer: If you have any questions, feel free to contact our support team.

verification.subject: Verify your email address
verification.body: Please verify your email address by clicking the button below.
verification.footer: This link will expire in 24 hours. If you didn't create an account, please ignore this email.

passwordReset.subject: Reset your password
passwordReset.body: You requested to reset your password. Click the button below to create a new password.
passwordReset.footer: This link will expire in 1 hour. If you didn't request this, please ignore this email.

orderConfirmation.subject: Order Confirmation - #{{orderNumber}}
orderConfirmation.body: Thank you for your order! Your order #{{orderNumber}} has been confirmed.
orderConfirmation.footer: We'll send you another email when your order ships.

orderShipped.subject: Your order has shipped - #{{orderNumber}}
orderShipped.body: Great news! Your order #{{orderNumber}} has been shipped and is on its way.

orderDelivered.subject: Your order has been delivered - #{{orderNumber}}
orderDelivered.body: Your order #{{orderNumber}} has been delivered successfully.
orderDelivered.footer: Thank you for shopping with us!

common.unsubscribe: If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you can unsubscribe here.
